subject: Important: Your account will be locked in 24 hours
message: Your Outlook account has suspicious activity. Verify your login now to avoid lockout.

subject: Unauthorized login detected on your PayPal account
message: Click the secure link to confirm your payment settings and stop unauthorized access.

subject: Annual benefit review requires immediate login
message: Your HR records are due for audit. Please sign in to the HR portal to update your data.

subject: New device signed into your Chase account
message: We detected a login from an unknown location. Please verify immediately.

subject: Mandatory security patch installation
message: Failure to install the patch may lock your workstation. Login here to install.

subject: Your Netflix payment failed
message: Please update your payment method to avoid interruption of service.

subject: Apple Pay alert: Unusual purchase attempt
message: Unrecognized charge on your wallet. Click here to review activity.

subject: Action Required: SSN confirmation pending
message: You must verify your Social Security Number to avoid suspension.

subject: Grade report available – login to access
message: Your school records are ready. Use your credentials to log in.

subject: Amazon account flagged – confirm recent purchase
message: If you did not make this purchase, please verify your account now.

subject: Your shared files have been quarantined
message: Click to review quarantined documents and restore access.

subject: Urgent: Wallet Recovery Attempt Detected
message: Recovery keys requested from a new location. Cancel if not you.

subject: Your Office365 license expires today
message: Renew your license to avoid service interruption.

subject: VPN access restricted – update credentials
message: Revalidate your credentials to restore VPN access.

subject: Medical claim rejected – update insurance info
message: Your recent medical claim requires additional verification.

subject: Facebook account disabled due to unusual activity
message: Reactivate your account by clicking the button below.

subject: Your Zelle transaction has been put on hold
message: Update your bank details to complete the transaction.

subject: Shipment on hold – wrong address entered
message: Correct your address to receive your package.

subject: Citibank fraud alert – immediate action needed
message: Confirm recent activity or your account will be frozen.

subject: Slack user access verification
message: Admin access requested from a new device. Confirm or deny.
